title: A Boys' winter games lesson
creator_credit: Gaumont-British Instructional and Andrew Miller Jones
brief_description: This film shows a typical organised field games lesson for a class of boys aged 11 from an elementary school in a congested area of a big city. The lesson includes Association football and Rugby Touch, together with group practices leading up to these games. Based on British Board of Education Syllabus of Physical Training for Schools, 1933.
